original_text: I myself will set my face against him and his family and will cut them off from their people together with all who follow him in prostituting themselves to Molek.
korean_text: 내가 그 사람과 그의 권속에게 진노하여 그와 그를 본받아 몰렉을 음란하게 섬기는 모든 사람을 그들의 백성 중에서 끊으리라

sentences.original_text: I myself will set my face against him
and will cut them off from their people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 그 백성 중에서 끊어 버리겠다

sentences.original_text: together with all who follow him
